snippet: Jonnie R. Williams Sr., a wealthy Virginia businessman and the star witness in the corruption trial of former Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife, testified for a second day on Thursday.
abstract: Jonnie R Williams Sr, star witness in corruption trial of former Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell and his wife Maureen, testifies for a second day, offering new details about lavish gifts he gave to the couple; prosecution is seeking to show that McDonnell took official actions to help Williams in exchange for the gifts.
lead_paragraph: Jonnie R. Williams Sr., a wealthy Virginia businessman and the star witness in the corruption trial of former Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife, testified for a second day on Thursday.

headline.main: Jury in Ex-Virginia Governor’s Trial Hears of Money Transfer
headline.print_headline: Jury in Ex-Governor’s Trial Hears of Money Transfer
